      • countNeighbourMines

      • addToMineTable

        public void addToMineTable​(int number)
        complementary method for generateMines(). Calculates a place in mine table
        Parameters:
        number - variable specifying place of mine

      • checkIfGameWon

        public boolean checkIfGameWon()
        Check if game won. It goes through every position and check if icon is different than untouched which means it hasn't been clicked.
        Returns:
        true if game won, false if game yet not won

      • addAllFlags

        public void addAllFlags()
        In Minesweeper there is no condition of marking all flags, so if game is won and some flags are not marked this function do it.

      • countFlagsForMines

        public void countFlagsForMines()
        Change counter based on a difference between number of mines and flags on board

        Returns:
        returns an icon based on number
